# hash(into:)

**Instance Method**

Hashes the components of this value using the specified hasher.

## Declaration

```swift
func hash(into hasher: inout Hasher)
```

## Parameters

- **hasher**: The hasher to use when combining the components.

## Hashing and comparing

- **==(_:_:)**: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether two sets have equal elements.

items.description: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether two sets have equal elements.
